name: A Pun a Day
description:
Mr. Dad and child have moved across the country for Mr. Dad's new job.

Since then, they have butted heads.

Through the power of song, love, and dad jokes, they must come together again.

Jennifer Bourke -Character Art & Music

Gabriel Gray - Environment Art

Jay Idema - Programming

Rachel Mailhot - Writing & Title Art

Made for the 2019 Global Game Jam with TVGS at RPI

Note:  Day 4 is really long for no reason (Sorry). The game is not over until you reach the title screen again!
